paragraphs: This material may not be published, broadcast, rewritten, or redistributed. ©2025 FOX News Network, LLC. All rights reserved. Quotes displayed in real-time or delayed by at least 15 minutes. Market data provided by Factset. Powered and implemented by FactSet Digital Solutions. Legal Statement. Mutual Fund and ETF data provided by Refinitiv Lipper.
LeBron James made his debut in the 23rd season of his NBA career as the Los Angeles Lakers dominated the Utah Jazz, 140-26, on Tuesday night.
The best team in the East is ... Detroit? See the latest NBA title odds and where the surprising Pistons stack up.
For his 30th birthday, Karl-Anthony Towns received a touching gift from Jordyn Woods — the same Isuzu Trooper his late mother once drove.
Seven triple-doubles in 12 games? That's been enough to catapult the Serbian superstar back to the top of the oddsboard. See the latest.
Golden State Warriors star Draymond Green had a face-to-face confrontation with a New Orleans Pelicans fan during the team's win on Sunday night.
The NBA is collecting cell phones from multiple teams as part of its investigation into illegal sports gambling following federal indictments of coaches and players.
The New Orleans Pelicans fired Willie Green after a 2-10 start, the team confirmed. Assistant James Borrego will step in as interim coach as key player injuries mount.
Victor Wembanyama dunked over Draymond Green in a fiery showdown, but Stephen Curry’s 49 points powered the Golden State Warriors to a thrilling 109-108 victory.
Former NBA guard Patrick Beverley was arrested in Texas on a felony assault charge involving a family member. The former Milwaukee Bucks player faces serious allegations.
The 2025 NBA Cup continues on Friday. See the odds for who is slated to win the latest in-season tournament.
Kevin Love reflected on the growing gambling crisis in professional sports, warning that betting controversies are hurting the sport and distracting from the game.
Longtime NBA veteran Kevin Love talks to Fox News Digital about the "stain" of gambling in professional sports and his hopes for a resolution.
Shohei Ohtani is nearly without peer in MLB after his latest Most Valuable Player Award, so it's time to look to other leagues for comparison, too.
Kevin Love is now in his 18th NBA season with the Utah Jazz, predicting longer careers will become the norm thanks to advanced sports science and wellness innovations.
NBA champion Kevin Love talks to Fox News Digital about his approach to his 18th NBA season and how improved sports science can lead to longer athletic careers.
Los Angeles Lakers point guard Luka Doncic reacted Wednesday to the Dallas Mavericks' firing of general manager Nico Harrison after their loss to the Oklahoma City Thunder.
NBA players Jerami Grant and Yves Missi were ejected after a heated altercation during the Trail Blazers vs. Pelicans game. Both received technical fouls in Wednesday's matchup.
The Los Angeles Clippers will be without guard Bradley Beal for the rest of the season as he's set to undergo season-ending hip surgery, the team said.
The mother of Philadelphia 76ers forward Justin Edwards said her son was going to catch a "beating" for cursing after a big shot in the win over the Boston Celtics.
The Dallas Mavericks announced that they fired embattled general manager Nico Harrison on Tuesday just months after he made the infamous Luka Doncic trade.
Four-time NBA All-Star Michael Ray Richardson, a former New York Knicks standout known for his defense and trouble off the court, has died at age 70.
Toronto Raptors star Brandon Ingram was fined $25,000 after angrily spiking a water bottle that struck a staffer during a loss to the Philadelphia 76ers.
It's not too early to think about who might go No. 1 in next year's NBA Draft. See the odds for the top pick in 2026.
NBA legend Lenny Wilkens, who was inducted into the Basketball Hall of Fame as both player and coach, has passed away on Sunday at 88 years old.
Toronto Raptors star Brandon Ingram spiked his water bottle down in frustration and a staffer was collateral damage as he got hit the face.
Erik Spoelstra expressed gratitude to first responders and fans after a fire destroyed his home, saying his family’s safety mattered more than any possessions.
Rick Pitino, who coached Terry Rozier at Louisville, said he contacted Rozier following his arrest and offered to help in any way he could as Rozier awaits the outcome of his case.
St. John's head coach Rick Pitino reveals what surprised him most about his former player Terry Rozier's gambling arrest during an appearance on OutKick's "Don't @ Me with Dan Dakich."
Former NBA player Damon Jones pleaded not guilty to fraud charges in gambling cases involving alleged insider tips about Los Angeles Lakers players and illegal poker games.
NBA rookie Cooper Flagg admitted needing to adjust to losing as the Dallas Mavericks start the NBA season 2-6 despite his 14.4 points averaged per game.
